programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two Spanish conmen set off for South America on a quest to discover the legendary City of Gold, but soon find themselves in the enviable position of being worshipped as gods by the natives - much to the displeasure of a local priest. Animated musical adventure, with the voices of Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez, Armand Assante and Edward James Olmos, and featuring a soundtrack by Elton John

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: A swashbuckling hero has 10 days to recover a priceless book from a deceitful sea goddess or his friend will be executed. As he sets out on his quest, he discovers the condemned mans fiancee has stowed away on board his ship to make sure he goes through with the task. Animated adventure, with the voices of Brad Pitt, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Joseph Fiennes and Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Shenxiu was abandoned by her mother when she was a child. Since then, she has bad dreams about a monster called Nightmare. One day, she travels on a cruise ship with her family. On a stormy night, she falls and breaks into the fancy Deep Sea restaurant. She meets the Chef, Nanhe, and embarks on a mysterious journey. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Brian Flaccus and Angela Malhotra

programme.title: The Ogglies
programme.desc: Looking for a new home, the Oggly family end up in the beautiful, peaceful village of Smelliville when Firebottom, the family dragon, crash-lands on a run-down rubbish tip. Unfortunately, Smelliville has a stinky problem - the dump is spoiling the place, and something must be done. Animated family adventure, with the voice of Ben Young

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: A tap-dancing penguin goes searching for his missing son, but his search leads him to discover a drifting iceberg that threatens to destroy his colony. He sets out to unite all the birds in the Antarctic to avert the catastrophe. Animated musical comedy sequel, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Ava Acres and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: A young penguin disappoints his fellow seabirds with his inability to sing - but instead he displays a remarkable talent for tap dancing. However, his elders refuse to accept this outlandish behaviour and send the youngster into exile, marking the start of a wonderful journey. Animated adventure, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A spoiled, selfish cat carelessly loses his ninth life, but winds up being reincarnated as a different animal in each of his next lives. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mo Gilligan, Simone Ashley and Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his towns weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: A scientist believes he has saved the world from his invention, a machine that accidentally turned water into food. However, he learns the device is still active and has created a race of food/animal hybrids that he must stop from running wild across the world. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the counts daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his sons tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Flummels are an extinct species of rabbit-like creatures with holes in their centre. One day two of the fluffy animals find themselves transported from 1835 to modern day Shanghai. Animated adventure from the makers of The Simpsons Movie, featuring the voices of Adam Devine, Rachel Bloom and Ken Jeong

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas (an all-female a cappella singing group) reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour. However, they face a squad who uses both instruments and voices. Final part of the blockbusting comedy trilogy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A lazy twentysomething lives off his wealthy hotel magnate father. When the old man decides to retire, he begins to question whether his layabout son is suitable to take over the family empire and issues a challenge - he must retake 12 years of school in 24 weeks, or lose everything. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Bridgette Wilson, Darren McGavin and Bradley Whitford.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A smooth-talking chauffeur employs his natural charm to enjoy a string of casual liaisons with a host of women - but as he tires of his bed-hopping antics, he struggles to work out what is missing from his life. Comedy drama remake, starring Jude Law, Sienna Miller, Susan Sarandon and Marisa Tomei

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: During the build-up to the first broadcast of Saturday Night Live on October 11th 1975, a group of young comedians and writers prepare to change television forever. Comedy, starring Gabriel LaBelle, Rachel Sennott, Cory Michael Smith and Ella Hunt

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A teenager is surprised when she is befriended by the girls in the most popular clique at her new school. However, a dating mishap leads to trouble and her supposed friends start to turn on her. Urged on by other pals outside their circle, the newcomer resolves to bring down the self-appointed queen of campus - only to end up adopting some of her rivals crueller characteristics. Comedy, with Lindsay Lohan, Rachel McAdams, Tina Fey and Lacey Chabert

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic, starring Angourie Rice, Renee Rapp, Aulii Cravalho, and Tina Fey, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A washed-up quarterback ends up in jail after a drunken night out, and is ordered by the warden to put together an American football team to take on the guards, with the help of a former college champ. Remake of 1974 comedy The Mean Machine, with Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Nelly and Burt Reynolds, who starred in the original

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britains leading spy following the assassination of all the countrys other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the towns Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: In a fantasy world where a fairy godmother endows each newborn with a special attribute, baby Ella is given the unwelcome gift of obedience. While growing up, she is magically compelled to do anything she is told to, and her stepmother takes great delight in forcing the girl to obey her every whim. So Ella sets out on a quest to find her fairy godmother and get her to take back her unwanted birthright. Fantasy adventure, starring Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Minnie Driver and Joanna Lumley

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Green-skinned Elphaba Thropp becomes part of the new intake at Shiz University, and shares a room with fellow spell-caster Galinda Upland. Its the beginning of a friendship which culminates in an epic showdown as Elphaba transforms a renegade witch with a skill for bursting into show-stopping songs, like Defying Gravity. Part one of The Wizard of Oz prequel based on the hit stage musical, starring Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande-Butera, Jonathan Bailey, Michelle Yeoh and Jeff Goldblum

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: As a young boy, Willy Wonka inherits a love of chocolate from his mother. When she dies, Willy pursues his dream of opening a chocolate shop in the arcade where confectionery titans Slugworth, Fickelgruber and Prodnose have boutiques. The three entrepreneurs secretly bribe the Chief of Police to thwart Willys ambitions. Co-writer/director Paul Kings fantasy adventure, starring Timothee Chalamet, Calah Lane, Olivia Colman and Hugh Grant

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: A Jewish lawyer looking forward to his retirement is pressured by his ailing mother to organise one last family holiday. Fulfilling her wish means reuniting his grown-up children, who have all gone their separate ways and cannot stand each other. Comedy drama, starring Timothy Spall, Honor Blackman, James Callis and Rhona Mitra

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A teenager discovers his new neighbour is the writer of a popular series of books, who harbours a terrifying secret. The ghosts and monsters the author writes about are real, and his stories keep them contained. The youngster accidentally releases them into the real world, and has to find a way to get them back in the books before they can cause chaos. Fantasy adventure, starring Jack Black and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical version of the stage play based on Charles Dickens classic tale about a lonely workhouse orphan who ends up on the cold streets of London, where he falls under the wing of petty crook Fagin and his gang of young backstreet thieves. Featuring the iconic songs Food, Glorious Food, Consider Yourself, As Long as He Needs Me and Youve Got to Pick a Pocket or Two. Starring Ron Moody, Mark Lester, Oliver Reed, Jack Wild, Harry Secombe, Shani Wallis and Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: A conniving bear and his diminutive sidekick learn that the national park they live in is due to be closed down by the greedy local mayor. They must join forces with their old foe, a park ranger who resents their mischief-making, to save the day. Comedy based on the cartoon series, starring Anna Faris and Tom Cavanagh, and featuring the voices of Dan Aykroyd and Justin Timberlake.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Green-skinned Elphaba Thropp becomes part of the new intake at Shiz University, and shares a room with fellow spell-caster Galinda Upland. Its the beginning of a friendship which culminates in an epic showdown as Elphaba transforms a renegade witch with a skill for bursting into show-stopping songs, like Defying Gravity. Part one of The Wizard of Oz prequel based on the hit stage musical, starring Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande-Butera, Jonathan Bailey, Michelle Yeoh and Jeff Goldblum

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: As a young boy, Willy Wonka inherits a love of chocolate from his mother. When she dies, Willy pursues his dream of opening a chocolate shop in the arcade where confectionery titans Slugworth, Fickelgruber and Prodnose have boutiques. The three entrepreneurs secretly bribe the Chief of Police to thwart Willys ambitions. Co-writer/director Paul Kings fantasy adventure, starring Timothee Chalamet, Calah Lane, Olivia Colman and Hugh Grant

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young heros quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Endes novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: The adventures of the boy who never grows old, as he whisks Wendy Darling and her brothers away to the magical world of Neverland - where they come face to face with fearsome Captain Hook. Adaptation of JM Barries fantasy novel, starring Jeremy Sumpter, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Jason Isaacs and Lynn Redgrave

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical version of the stage play based on Charles Dickens classic tale about a lonely workhouse orphan who ends up on the cold streets of London, where he falls under the wing of petty crook Fagin and his gang of young backstreet thieves. Featuring the iconic songs Food, Glorious Food, Consider Yourself, As Long as He Needs Me and Youve Got to Pick a Pocket or Two. Starring Ron Moody, Mark Lester, Oliver Reed, Jack Wild, Harry Secombe, Shani Wallis and Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Two lookalike youngsters trade places to help resolve each others problems. Childrens comedy, starring Kirstie Alley, Steve Guttenberg and Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Mildred, an 11-year-old girl, finds her world turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, takes her on a wild adventure. Family comedy, starring Elijah Wood and Nell Fisher

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris ODonnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her fathers killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderers trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A grizzled drifter rescues a nun from a gang of rapists and gets roped into escorting her across the Mexican desert. He gradually realises there is more to his new companion than meets the eye - and she may be hiding a surprising secret. Don Siegels Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo Fabregas, Alberto Morin and John Kelly

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppolas gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: An American student is arrested for drug smuggling while on holiday in Turkey, and thrown into a brutal prison ruled by a sadistic warder. His family and the US government plan an appeal, but he begins to realise that diplomatic efforts are fruitless, and his only hope is to plot a desperate escape. Alan Parkers fact-based drama, starring Brad Davis, John Hurt and Randy Quaid

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter intervenes when a man and his family are threatened by a predatory cattle baron determined to force every homesteader in the valley off the land. The situation rapidly escalates into violence, while an unspoken attraction develops between the gunman and the settlers wife. Western, starring Alan Ladd, Jack Palance, Van Heflin and Jean Arthur. Based on the novel by Jack Schaefer

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Leans Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemanns adaptation of Fredericks Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

Francis Ford Coppolas Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale and Lee Strasberg

programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herberts acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: A father and his two sons face off against terrifying creatures in a remote farmhouse. Director Benjamin Brewers dystopian horror thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Jaeden Martell and Maxwell Jenkins

programme.desc: In 2045, gamers explore a virtual world in the quest for a deceased tycoons fortune. However, they must also contend with an evil corporation who will stop at nothing to get their hands on the prize. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Ernest Clines novel, starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn, Simon Pegg and Mark Rylance

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: An android is sent to Earth by aliens on a diplomatic mission, and arrives in the middle of the the Jordanian Civil War of 1970. When Gordon receives information from Houston of military conflict with the Russians, the Americans are ordered to seize control of the facility. Drama, starring Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina and John Gallagher Jr

Sci-fi drama, starring Colin Farrell and Jodie Turner-Smith

programme.desc: It was 30 years after the Romans invaded Britain that they were ready to take on the challenge of conquering the Lake District. With the toughest landscape they had encountered in the nation, peopled by a rebellious tribe, it was no small task, but within a few years, the whole of Lakeland was under their control. programme.desc: Love is a universal and powerful emotion, but it can also be destructive. This episode focuses on historial acts of love and betrayal. It features the medieval romance of Tristan and Isolde, whose love affair threatened the fate of their kingdom. Plus, how the abandonment of Dido by the hero Aeneas paved the way for Rome, how Norse attitudes to sex and marriage were expressed in the burlesque farce the Lay of Thrym and features Medea, who was guilty of the darkest crime of love and passion - the murder of her own children

programme.title: Walking Through History
programme.desc: Tony Robinson takes a four-day trek along the coastline between Plymouth in Devon and Falmouth, learning about the thriving smuggling trade in Cornwall during the late 18th century. The areas tiny secretive harbours, beaches and secluded coves were ideal for illicit imports such as tobacco and brandy, and the business was so huge it threatened the national economy. Along his route, visiting such beauty spots as Lantic Bay and Polperro, he encounters all sorts of reminders of the trade and meets descendants of those involved

A team from Cardiff University is called to the bone cave of Wales to investigate medieval bones protruding from a cliff face on the Welsh coast

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: Through use of recently declassified CIA documents, the X-Files actor uncovers tales of governments striking dark deals with cults, mobs and even sworn enemies. He reveals how frosty relationships and mounting tensions are tested head on woth such moves

programme.title: Myths and Monsters
programme.desc: Love is a universal and powerful emotion, but it can also be destructive. This episode focuses on historial acts of love and betrayal. It features the medieval romance of Tristan and Isolde, whose love affair threatened the fate of their kingdom. Plus, how the abandonment of Dido by the hero Aeneas paved the way for Rome, how Norse attitudes to sex and marriage were expressed in the burlesque farce the Lay of Thrym and features Medea, who was guilty of the darkest crime of love and passion - the murder of her own children

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.sub-title: Aswang, Crashed on Mars and Giant Wolves
programme.desc: The truth behind recent caught-on-camera sightings of a dreaded Filipino creature known as the Aswang. Plus, a big bad wolf supposedly stalking the woods of Saskatchewan and the full facts of the night a UFO famously appeared in Montreal

programme.title: World War Weird
programme.desc: The unfortunate fate of the worlds first tank, which failed to make it onto the battlefield, and the case of the Japanese soldier who continued fighting - until 1974

programme.title: World War Weird
programme.desc: The true story of Franz Stigler, a German Luftwaffe pilot in the Second World War who risked his own life to save the crew of an American B-17 bomber

programme.title: The Nostradamus Effect
programme.desc: An attempt to discover hidden meanings behind Leonardo da Vincis paintings, to see if the artist was also a prophet, as well as one of historys great philosophers and engineers

programme.title: The Nostradamus Effect
programme.desc: Experts examine the plausibility of the Egyptian prophecy about the impact of a comet causing unimaginable destruction in 2012

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: The Great Pyramid of Giza remains one of the most captivating mysteries of the ancient world, with compelling evidence suggesting it may have functioned as an ancient power plant. Adding to the intrigue, the pyramids at Teotihuacan in Mexico feature heat-shielding mica in their design

programme.title: Alien Files: Unsealed
programme.desc: Experts scrutinise the engineering behind the Egyptians Sphinx and pyramids, questioning whether extra-terrestrial help was utilised to complete the structures

programme.title: Walking Through History
programme.desc: Tony Robinson takes a four-day trek along the coastline between Plymouth in Devon and Falmouth, learning about the thriving smuggling trade in Cornwall during the late 18th century. The areas tiny secretive harbours, beaches and secluded coves were ideal for illicit imports such as tobacco and brandy, and the business was so huge it threatened the national economy. Along his route, visiting such beauty spots as Lantic Bay and Polperro, he encounters all sorts of reminders of the trade and meets descendants of those involved

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Alice Roberts visits a secret location in the Cotswolds, which appears to be a high-status Anglo Saxon cemetery, where she finds a very precious and fragile artefact. A team from Cardiff University is called to the bone cave of Wales to investigate medieval bones protruding from a cliff face on the Welsh coast

programme.title: Weird Britain

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Lancaster Castle has witnessed scenes of historical, cultural and political significance throughout the centuries, including incidents of religious persecution, the trials of the Lancashire Witches and 200 public executions. Owned by the Duchy of Lancaster, it was a state prison until 2011 and is still a working crown court. Dan Jones explores its turbulent history and meets Wendy Robinson, a retired prosecutor from Australia, whose ancestors were sentenced to death at Lancaster Crown Court in 1817 for stealing sheep

programme.desc: Tori Herridge and a team of scientists investigate when the remains of a young woman from the Bronze Age are found during routine roadworks on the A9 in Scotland. programme.title: Rust Valley Restorers
programme.desc: Mike kicks off his fifth year in business with the restoration of a rare 1971 International Scout II, before teaming up with his brothers to find a new home for their late fathers 1964 Mercury motor

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Arundel Castle, in West Sussex, has been the seat of the Dukes of Norfolk and their ancestors for over 850 years, with its fortunes rising and falling with those of the Howard family. A particularly low point occured when Thomas Howard, the fourth Duke of Norfolk, was executed by Elizabeth I for allegedly plotting to marry her rival Mary Queen of Scots. Dan Jones meets a weapons expert, who shows him how Richard FitzAlan, the third Earl of Arundel, would have fought in the 100 Years War. He also meets a social historian, who gives an insight into how Arundel would have prepared for Queen Victorias visit in 1846

programme.title: Witches of Essex
programme.desc: Henry VIIIs law against witches in 1542 led to thousands of women being persecuted and many burned at the stake. New investigative techniques and historical records are to re-examine the fates of women accused of witchcraft during 16th and 17th-century witch trials in Essex. Rylan and Alice Roberts explores the events, lives, and alleged crimes of those accused, often bringing the stories to life through scripted drama and featuring expert testimony from historians and psychologists

programme.title: The Witches of Salem
programme.desc: The hysteria that unfolded during the Salem witch trials, leading to the execution of 20 women in an affluent New England community. Mark Strong narrates a real-life horror story, with young teenage girls tragically accused and convicted by the shadowy adults lurking in the background. The series draws on extensive historical documents and court records to bring this drama to life

programme.title: The Witches of Salem
programme.desc: How paranoia regarding the suprnatural reached fever pitch as the demonic conspiracy terrorising Salem village grew, leaving no one safe. Boston jail filled with suspected witches and those accused faced execution if found guilty. Narrated by Mark Strong

programme.title: The Witches of Salem
programme.desc: The Salem witch trials began with the case against Bridget Bishop, who is quickly found guilty and sentenced to death by hanging. Her death was not enough to quell the hysteria, and five more women were tried and executed within a month. Narrated by Mark Strong

programme.title: The Witches of Salem
programme.desc: The searing, real-life horror story of the mass witch-hunt that enveloped Salem and New England in 1692. The hysteria and panic that overtook the Puritan community of Salem led to the execution of 20 innocent souls. This instlament explains how the trials were suddenly halted when the Massachusetts elite were accused of witchcraft, and Salem had to deal with the aftermath. Narrated by Mark Strong

programme.title: Live NFL
programme.desc: Atlanta Falcons v Buffalo Bills (Kick-off 12.15am). Coverage of the week six match at Mercedes-Benz Stadium, as the two teams meet for the first time since 2022. The Bills have won the last two games against the Falcons including a 29-15 victory in January 2022. Before losing those previous two matches the Falcons had won four matches in a row, with the hosts have only losing twice against their visitors since 1995

programme.title: Live NFL
programme.desc: Washington Commanders v Chicago Bears (Kick-off 1.15am). Coverage of the week six match at Northwest Stadium in Landover, Maryland. The hosts have a good recent record against the Bears having only lost two of the last 11 meetings between the two sides. However those two victories for the visitors have come in the last four games and Chicago will be looking for another important victory after a slow start to the season

programme.title: Fíorsceal
programme.desc: Documentary following the Pygmy peoples. In the forests of six central African countries are the Little People, a collective of indigenous hunter-gatherer tribes that live a life in harmony with the forests ecosystem. This film captures the unique rites and traditions of their communal life within the jungle. As ultimate specialists of their environment and holders of an immense ancestral knowledge of forest ecology, the Pygmies have an essential role to play in the future of this invaluable forest heritage

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond debate which company has made the greatest number of exceptional vehicles, and James May finds a way of transporting caravans to campsites without inconveniencing other road users. programme.title: Aussie Road Train Truckers
programme.desc: Documentary series following a cast of Australian road train drivers as they haul cargo across the Outback - the drivers are often away from their families for weeks at a time chasing contracts along some of the world’s longest roads. The drivers all have highly specialised road skills and knowledge of the local environment - with their trailers in tow, they battle unforgiving terrain and weather conditions to deliver food, cattle and construction supplies to those who need it the most.

Film director Guy Ritchie is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car, and there is also a group test of high-performance off-roaders from BMW, Audi and Range Rover

programme.title: Top Gear

Finally, they make their own version of chicken schnitzel, a Middle Eastern dish with European roots

programme.desc: The comedian reflects on the role of family in modern life as he holds up a mirror to the countless questionable things to which all society is exposed, yet tends to accept without question

programme.title: Judge Romesh
programme.desc: A rapper has to defend himself against claims hes getting too close to his fans. And a wife is furious at her husband for his extreme ironing antics

programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: Paddy Garvey is awarded his medal at Buckingham Palace, and an old flame returns into Major James McCuddens life. Starring Jerome Flynn

programme.title: Doctors
programme.desc: A man caring for his terminally ill mother stands up to his younger brother, while George makes a surprise announcement. Stirling Gallacher stars

programme.title: Doctors
programme.desc: Ronnie grows tired of playing games, while Michelle tries to keep her cool as she comes to the aid of some quarrelling neighbours. Medical drama, starring Stephen Boxer, Stirling Gallacher and Adrian Lewis Morgan

programme.title: Holby City
programme.desc: Stan is devastated to learn of his wifes illness when she is rushed into casualty - and the news that she turned down treatment without consulting him cuts even deeper. Meanwhile, Sam struggles to cope with the hospital gossip after her bitter break-up with Alex, and Steve takes action when he feels his father is moving on too soon after his mothers death. Medical drama, starring Colette Brown and Paul Shane

programme.title: Casualty
programme.desc: Charlie suspects Simon has been bribed by an equipment supplier, increasing the tension between the two to dangerous levels. A girl is brought in after being found wandering alone wearing only a nightie, and her confused comments lead to a desperate search by Dixie and Maggie, placing the latters life in danger. Derek Thompson stars

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Callum returns to work, determined to uncover the truth about the rape allegation that blackened his dead fathers name as a police officer and divided the family for 20 years. Kirsty is shocked by the sergeants brusque attitude in handling a vulnerable witness, and Smithy eventually realises his troubled colleague will stop at nothing to get a result against a knife-wielding blackmailer. Guest starring Lesley Vickerage (The Inspector Lynley Mysteries) and David Schofield (Pirates of the Caribbean)

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Shirl hurts Heather in the worst way possible, while Bianca and Ricky unite for a life-changing decision. Dawn and Minty must face the truth about Garrys disappearance

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Dawn refuses to accept the devastating news about Garry, while Minty struggles to break her out of her denial. Meanwhile, Ian has a radical solution to his business problems

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: The men take part in a training exercise in dealing with chemical weapons, and the arrival of a new soldier in the regiment brings trouble

programme.title: Monarch of the Glen
programme.desc: Duncans romantic hopes are crushed when Golly reveals Jessica is his daughter, and Alison has to tell her the truth before she finds out from someone else. Meanwhile, when Lexie gets an admirer, she is more than happy to use it to her advantage. Richard Briers, Alastair MacKenzie and Susan Hampshire star

programme.title: Londons Burning
programme.desc: Blue Watch come to the rescue of an old firefighter. Colins probation period ends. The team also tackle a blaze in the attic of a house. Starring Steve North

programme.title: The Upper Hand
programme.desc: An old friend visits Caroline and finds Charlie attractive. Comedy, starring Diana Weston and Joe McGann

programme.title: Terry and June
programme.desc: Terry looks after Tinas 12-year-old nephew, and finds himself having problems with graffiti and a childrens fancy-dress parade. Terry Scott stars

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Mother of All Mistakes - or Is It?
programme.desc: Hobbo discovers the whereabouts of his real mother and decides to pay her a visit, but is unimpressed by the welcome he receives. Marina chains herself to a supermarket trolley in protest against the unreliability of men, while Nelly reveals some information that greatly lifts Hobbos spirits

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Will Howard Cross the Atlantic Single-Handed?
programme.desc: Hobbo is convinced Nelly is his natural mother and tries to establish where he was born, while Howard vows to row across the Atlantic single-handed in a bid to counter Marinas suggestions that he lacks spontaneity. Barrys clothing problem is solved when he is called to help clear Tobys blocked drain

programme.title: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. A diabetic girl disappears without her insulin, and Lynley discovers she was last seen talking to a couple who had previously been sighted with a youngster later found drowned in a lake. The detective stages a press appeal, hoping to learn more about the mysterious pair and reveal their roles in both cases. Crime drama, starring Nathaniel Parker and Sharon Small

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the kidnapping of two boys in 1979, which they believe could be linked to a recent spate of disappearances. The youngsters involved in the earlier case escaped - though their abductor was never found. Fearing they may be on the trail of a serial killer, the detectives also uncover a link with another unsolved case - the assault on a champion fisherman

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: Ruth is approached by an official council snooper claiming to have witnessed covert activity. She initially dismisses his claims, but on learning the man has applied to MI5 four times and been rejected owing to mental instability, she visits his flat to follow up the lead. However, she becomes embroiled in a dangerous situation linked to the death of a Mafia leader that Dimitri is investigating. Elsewhere, Lucas comes face to face with Harry in a confrontation destined to change Section D for ever

programme.title: Lovejoy
programme.desc: The roguish dealers daughter Vicki finds a ceremonial sword in the attic of her new flat that proves to have Scottish connections dating back to the era of Bonnie Prince Charlie. Lovejoy is approached by a man offering a generous sum for it, claiming a family connection. Later, after the item is subjected to a bungled burglary attempt investigations reveal it may hold the key to the location of buried treasure. Ian McShane stars

programme.title: The Upper Hand
programme.desc: An old friend visits Caroline and finds Charlie attractive. Comedy, starring Diana Weston and Joe McGann

programme.title: Terry and June
programme.desc: Terry looks after Tinas 12-year-old nephew, and finds himself having problems with graffiti and a childrens fancy-dress parade. Terry Scott stars

programme.title: Hotel Portofino
programme.desc: During the 1920s, Rose and her mother, Julia, arrive at an Italian hotel to evaluate a prospective marriage with Lucian, the war veteran son of the residences proprietors. But his mother, Bella, has more immediate worries - her most critical guest, Lady Latchmere, has fallen ill. Drama, starring Natascha McElhone and Louisa Binder

programme.title: Doctors

programme.title: Doctors
programme.desc: A bitter woman who has refused to sign divorce papers ends up in intensive therapy. Meanwhile, Donna wrestles with her conscience. Martha Howe-Douglas stars

programme.title: Holby City
programme.desc: Ben finally plucks up the courage to tell his parents he is gay and ropes Sandy in for emotional support - but he is not prepared for the news they have for him. Meanwhile, Alex gets on the wrong side of Meyer by trying to make trouble for Sam after a bungled operation. Hospital drama, starring David Paisley and Jeremy Sheffield

programme.title: Casualty
programme.sub-title: Is She Really Going Out with Him?
programme.desc: A barbecue ends in a fight, leaving a man suffering a stroke and a pregnant woman with burns - but the violence does not stop there, and Maggie finds herself dragged into the conflict. Kelsey is thrilled at the prospect of seeing her soldier suitor James, Dixie shares her suspicions about Zana, and Toby is caught in bed with Joanne. Keith Barron, Richard Hawley and Madeline Fairley guest star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part series finale, a 14-year-old dies in Smithys arms following a stabbing incident, and CCTV footage reveals he had been acting as a mule for the older members of a gang. One of Mickeys informants is spotted at the crime scene and eventually gives vital evidence pointing to the most likely culprit, but the detective fears for her safety when she is released on bail and returns to the estate

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: As the residents of Walford prepare a memorial service for Garry, Dawn is finally forced to confront her true feelings for him. Ians romantic evening takes a surprising turn

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Dawns world is shaken by an ultimatum from a surprising source, while some racy secrets are revealed at the book club. Meanwhile, superdad Ricky tries to control Biancas kids

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: Joy plans a party for the girls while the men are on their training exercise at the Army training ground. Meanwhile, Dave Tucker opens up about feeling depressed

programme.title: Monarch of the Glen
programme.desc: The sale of Glenbogles biggest mountain for a development of holiday cottages causes a major rift between Stella and Archie, but the most sinister threat comes in the form of entrepreneur Stuart McIntosh who has his eye on both the land and Lexie. Richard Briers, Alastair Mackenzie and Susan Hampshire star

programme.title: Londons Burning
programme.desc: The fire-fighting team faces a race against time as it struggles to save a girl trapped in a silo. Meanwhile, Bayleaf is sent up a crane to talk a suicidal boy down

programme.title: The Upper Hand
programme.desc: Caroline disapproves of Charlies attitude towards the childrens fighting, but a traumatic day in which Tom also gets into trouble forces her to eat her words. Comedy, starring Joe McGann and Diana Weston

programme.title: Terry and June
programme.desc: When June agrees to look after a neighbours dog, Terry finds mans best friend lacks loyalty

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Whos That Looking Sideways at Nelly?
programme.desc: Hobbo enlists the help of Aunty Wainwright to become a master of disguise and deceive his secret enemies, and is delighted when Marina is attracted to his new looks - to the great annoyance of Howard. Meanwhile, a misunderstanding over a neck injury puts the police on Alvin and Entwistles trail

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Nobody Messes with Tony the Throat
programme.desc: Hobbo, Alvin and Entwistle set out to save the day when Howard suspects Pearl is seeing someone else and the trio soon draw up a surveillance operation that leads them to a seedy bikers club. Toby sets out to find Aunty Wainwright when he has ironing problems

programme.title: Harry Wild
programme.sub-title: Samurai Plague Doctor Kills for Kicks
programme.desc: Harry and Fergus are approached by a woman desperate to find out how her husband died and although they are reluctant to get involved, their interest is soon piqued. They discover gamblers are running a snuff game in Dublin and Harry turns over the evidence they uncover to Charlie, vowing to stay out of it, but the killers have other ideas

programme.title: Annika
programme.desc: When a body is found on a boat in the Clyde, the case takes the team to the Isle of Bute. Evidence points to a jilted lover, but a darker secret emerges as the team investigate. Crime drama, starring Nicola Walker, Jamie Sives and Katie Leung

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: A Home Office pathologist joins the team to help discover the identity of a dead girl found in woodland in 1987. The detectives trace her origins back to the Highlands of Scotland, uncovering evidence of syphilis and a possible connection with local aristocrat Lady Deeley. Meanwhile, Lane confronts his fears by revisiting the crime scene. Detective drama, guest starring Timothy West and Jane Asher

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: Following Lucass shocking revelations about his former life and double identity, Harry instructs the team to find him - at any cost. He enlists the help of a former internal affairs specialist to track down the fugitive, who is becoming increasingly desperate to locate the Albany file and flee the country with Maya. When Harry discovers Ruth has been placed in grave danger, he faces a tough decision that culminates in a showdown with Lucas

programme.title: Lovejoy
programme.desc: An antique Berber rug spells intrigue for the roguish dealer, leading him into a world of unrequited love and umbrella stands. Meanwhile, Lady Jane splits from her husband after refusing to accompany him to Hong Kong for his new job. Virginia McKenna guest stars

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom is tempted to earn some extra money, but it is not to pay the bills or replenish his dwindling savings. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Felicity Kendal, Penelope Keith and Paul Eddington. First broadcast in 1975

programme.title: Toast of London
programme.desc: Steven needs to raise money to pay for an acrimonious divorce and there are two potential solutions - a starring role in a new film being made by an Arab billionaire, or a laxative advert. He plumps for the former - against the advice of his agent - but given the content of the movie, has the actor made the right decision? Comedy, starring Matt Berry

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Nick Knowles Big House Clearout
programme.desc: In Lowestoft, Suffolk, the host meets a family of four who are being overwhelmed by a mountain of memories. Mum Cheryl lives with her partner, Robert, and her daughters, Tia and Cerys. After a tough few years following a divorce and bereavements, Cheryl finds it impossible to throw things away. Nick offers to clear out half of their unwanted belongings in return for a home makeover

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: High school sweethearts Mike and Ashley buy Ashleys childhood home hoping to raise a family there, but want to put their own touches on the familiar abode

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles, his team and a group of volunteers are in Monmouth, Wales, to transform the family home of Charlotte, a mother recovering from a stroke that left her with brain damage, speech loss and partial paralysis. The current layout of her home makes it difficult for Charlotte to move around and have her physiotherapy treatment, so the team redesign the house to make things easier for her, her husband Rob and their children

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to the Isle of Sheppey in Kent to meet two extraordinary dads, Garry and Kyle, who have adopted four vulnerable children - three of whom have special needs - to give them the best life possible. But their cramped three-bedroom bungalow is making family life difficult. So to give this family the space they so desperately need, the DIY SOS builders are undertaking their most ambitious project yet - to demolish the bungalow and build a bespoke five-bedroom house in its place. But with just nine days to complete the task, it looks like being their toughest one yet

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles meets midwife and kidney patient Sascha, who has to undergo intense dialysis sessions for hours on end, five days a week. This places the mother-of-fours body under great stress and the constant threat of blood clots gives her a life expectancy of just a few years. Determined to help, the DIY SOS team, bolstered by the local tradespeople and volunteers of Welwyn Garden City, renovate her home to include a dedicated dialysis room, offering her the chance of many more years with her family

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The remaining contestants receive a heartfelt letter from home and must win the judges over by creating a deeply personal dish

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: The paramedics of the West Midlands Ambulance Service are dispatched to help a woman who has had a seizure while in the shower

programme.title: Pete Wicks: For Dogs Sake
programme.desc: Strictly Come Dancing and TOWIE star Pete Wicks immerses himself in the heart-warming and emotional world of dog care at Basildons Dogs Trust rehoming centre. Pete returns to Dogs Trust, facing a suitcase of abandoned pups on day one and falling hard for Theo, a gentle Italian Mastiff with a serious heart condition.

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Noel Fitzpatrick faces one of his greatest practical and ethical challenges yet when hes introduced to Hermes, a tortoise with only one good leg. Can he provide Hermes with three prosthetic feet, using tiny titanium implants? Meanwhile, a rottweiler called Dave urgently needs an upgrade to his previous hip replacements

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A small cavachon is rushed to see Professor Noel Fitzpatrick after being hit by a car. She has a broken leg, but also a serious heart condition. Meanwhile, Simba, a one-year-old Labrador needs help with her badly formed hips, and Tulee the nervous basset hound has diseased discs in her back that leave her in constant pain

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Catherine and Simon went through years of fertility treatment to have their first son, which took a toll on their love life, but five years later, awaiting an elective C-section for their second baby, its a different story - a spontaneous romantic evening resulted in an unexpected positive pregnancy test. Heather ran into complications during her first pregnancy and had to deliver twins at 24 weeks. They pulled through, but cerebral palsy and other issues have meant she is now a full-time carer to them both. She also has Alfie, and after he was born, she and partner Dan decided they would have a fourth child to give him a companion to help share the responsibility of siblings with a disability. Christian couple Naomi and Dan tied the knot young and had their first child 13 months ago. Now, theyre back at Southmead for baby number two

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: The three semi-finalists upgrade lakeside holiday lodges in the heart of the Cotswolds, each of which includes an open-plan kitchen, living and dining space and an outside terrace. The buildings are decidedly beige, giving the designers a blank canvas to work on - and knowing they are only one week away from the final they really go to town, with schemes ranging from bold primary colours inspired by a classic 1980s movie to a sophisticated monochrome look. Michelle Ogundehin judges their efforts with help from designer Abigail Ahern

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Paramedics blue light it to a man who had a bad fall and has a suspected spinal injury, while Ash and Craig help a 12-year-old boy who has been attacked at his local fun fair

programme.title: Nick Knowles Big House Clearout
programme.desc: The presenter helps more families who are being crushed by their clutter. He begins in Portsmouth, where three generations are squeezed together in a three-bed semi thats bursting at the seams in an extraordinary challenge full of emotion and memories. When Sarahs husband Trevor suddenly passed away, she had to return from Dubai to her old house - in which her daughter Stevie and five-year-old grand-daughter were living. Coping with grief, Sarah was unable to face sorting through a lifetime of belongings, so for a year, the house has been totally packed with clutter from the attic to the outhouses, and its become the way they live

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Marcie is an Air Force veteran and cancer survivor looking for a fresh start for her and her daughters. Drew and Jonathan create a special space for this inspirational mum

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team return to Veterans Street in Manchester, where, in 2015, with the help of Prince William and Prince Harry, DIY SOS launched their most ambitious project yet - transforming a derelict street into a vibrant community for veterans and local people. This time they build the final home for decorated former soldier and single dad Simon Flores, whose foot was blown off by a roadside bomb during a patrol in Iraq

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team travel to Hessle, near Hull in East Yorkshire, to transform the home of Darren Hudson, who was left paralysed from the waist down due to a spinal cord injury. After three months of hospital rehabilitation, Darren returned home to his family, but tragedy struck again eight days later when his wife Sarah died suddenly. Since that moment, Darren and his three sons have been living in emotional trauma, with the wheelchair-using dad now the main carer for the family

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles meets 47-year-old Stuart in Torquay, who has progressive multiple sclerosis. Despite being six foot seven, he sleeps in a chair in the living room. His primary carer is his 73-year-old mother, Grandma Lin, who is completely blind, and walks across town every day to see to her son and her granddaughter Laurens needs. Can the crack team of builders, plasterers and electricians help turn their lives around?

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Previous winners Julie Goodwin and Nat Thaipun return to the kitchen for a two-round elimination that will determine this years Top Five

programme.title: Simply Nigella
programme.desc: The food writer demonstrates her favourite recipes for sharing with family and friends, including a tray of nourishing breakfast bars, a supper of crunchy chicken cutlets, and a dark and sumptuous chocolate cake. Plus she shows to make succulent belly pork burgers, which were inspired by a visit to a New York eatery

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Cameras follow thrill seeker 37-year-old Gareth and 32-year-old Jenny, who are focusing on their new adventure into parenthood, after Gareth was diagnosed with the life-limiting illness multiple sclerosis just 18 months into their relationship. Meanwhile, 28-year-old Tina and 32-year-old Alan are desperate to experience a natural birth for the first time, and 35-year-old Terry tries to cope as his partner Mel goes into labour with their second child, after the unexpected loss of their first

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Some worrying news about their unborn baby puts 34-year-old beautician Maria and builder Davids lives on hold. Cameras also follow 26-year-old doctor Ruby and her partner Colin, whose opposing personalities were put to the test when she suffered with post-natal depression after the birth of their first child. As they await the arrival of their second child, it remains to be seen whether Rubys hard working ethos or Colins jokey ways will help them get through. Plus, 34-year-old Gary and his partner Louises third baby is on the way

programme.title: Bad Girls Behind Bars
programme.desc: When travelling musician and drug user Carmen goes into multiple seizures, officers call a Code Blue emergency as staff and paramedics scramble to respond

programme.title: Bad Girls Behind Bars
programme.desc: The segregation pod of Western Massachusetts Regional Womens Correctional Centre houses the most violent inmates. When one of them attacks an officer, it takes all available staff to restrain her, and Sergeant Clayton begins an investigation into the reasons for the assault. Two prisoners who have been separated conduct a secret relationship, and a Satanist struggles to practice her religion behind bars

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: The two finalists go head to head, each taking on the redesign of a trendy bar in Londons vibrant Soho district. They have three days to make over the ground-floor bar and an intimate basement cocktail lounge - and to help, both contestants have a fellow team-mate, plus a team of trades. One designer goes all-out, relocating the bar to the other side of the room - but the more they rip out, the more it becomes a demolition zone. Down the road, there is indecision and angst as the other finalist realises just how much is at stake. Who will win the career-defining contract to design an upmarket apartment on the Cornish coast?

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Paramedics in Stoke respond to a call about a man who has collapsed with severe breathlessness, while in Dudley, crews treat a woman with a host of complex medical issues

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels through Minneapolis and St Paul, where he learns how the power of the Mississippi helped Minneapolis become a great industrial centre. Later in St Paul, he explores the birthplace of F Scott Fitzgerald, and meets with a Native American expert to discover more about a dark chapter in American history

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his rail journey along the Upper Mississippi to Red Wing, Minnesota, and the home of Laura Ingalls Wilder, author of Little House on the Prairie. Picking up the Empire Builder rail service he travels to Winona, where he finds out how, in the 19th century, the US Army Corps of Engineers made the Mississippi navigable and how the river is maintained today

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek goes to pick up a veteran 1904 Swift, theres an emotional farewell to a 1980s Bedford HA van, and a Toyota Corona finds a new home

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek gives the once-over to a Royale Formula Ford race car, and Paul is on a marathon trip to Teesside to pick up a 1953 MGYB, a Moggy Van and an 80s Yamaha 250RD motorbike

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: The Spanish island of Villa Winter, which was suspected of being a port for German U-boats and part of a larger plan to invade the United States

programme.title: Nazi Hunters
programme.desc: A look at how British-trained Czechs were behind the assassination of Reinhard Heydrich, one of the main architects of the Holocaust

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the show from Arley Hall and Gardens in Cheshire, where a time capsule that has been buried for 130 years is opened for the first time on camera. Other finds brought in include a gold bracelet with a tragic past that was found bricked up behind a wall, and a lost work by 19th-century artist Lawrence Alma-Tadema

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce returns to the gardens of the Arley Hall, Cheshire, where a selection of family treasures come under scrutiny. Among the items brought in to be valued are a portrait painted in India in the 1950s, which expert Amin Jaffer identifies as the work of an acclaimed artist whose paintings have become much sought after in recent years, while other finds include a PoWs diary written while building the bridge over the River Kwai and a collection of gems once worn by a duchess

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: There is a triple collection of desirable cars in store for Derek when an MG Midget, an Austin-Healey frogeye Sprite and an RS2000 come up for auction

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves son Jack heads to Cheshire to collect two cars with a 35-year age difference, and luckily for Mathewsons, Lucy knows exactly whats been brought in for auction
